plot: Caillou wants to learn how to roller skate... until he realizes roller skating is very difficult. Caillou wants to take a picture of a bunny rabbit in Grandma's garden, but it proves a harder task then he originally thought. Clementine can whistle, and Caillou can't! Caillou tries his best to learn and practices everywhere he goes... but he just can't seem to get the hang of it and this embarrasses him.—Anonymous
